gold.user: User wants to revoke access to their Trello account by deleting the token.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the token and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve details about their token to check its status.
gold.ideal: Returns the token details including expiration and permissions.

gold.user: User wants to know which member is associated with their token.
gold.ideal: Returns the member information linked to the token.

gold.user: User wants to get the username of the member associated with their token.
gold.ideal: Returns the username of the member linked to the token.

gold.user: User wants to see all webhooks associated with their token.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of webhooks linked to the token.

gold.user: User wants to add a new webhook to receive updates from Trello.
gold.ideal: Successfully adds the webhook and returns the webhook details.

gold.user: User wants to update an existing webhook to change its configuration.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the webhook and returns the updated details.

gold.user: User wants to delete a specific webhook that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the webhook and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve details about a specific webhook.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified webhook.

gold.user: User wants to check the permissions associated with their token.
gold.ideal: Returns the permissions granted to the token.
